course_title: Seminar in the Reception of the Classical World - RECPTN CLAS WRLD

001.comments: Racism in Antiquity. Visit cnrs.ubc.ca for full course descriptions.

description: Selected topics in the reception of the classicial world in its own time and in later eras, with an emphasis on research. Prerequisite: at least one 3-credit upper-level course of content appropriate for the topic of the seminar (to be established by individual instructors). Restricted to majors and honours students in CLST, CLAS, CLAH, ARGR, GRNE, CNRS.
